channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-21288] Runtime rowcount calculation is incorrect in vectorized executions
item.description:
before HIVE-18908; there was a baseForward (non vectorized) and vectorForward (vectorized); and both of them have accounted for the number of rows correctly - after HIVE-18908 this have changed to count vectorized batches in case of vectorized execution.

relevant part of Operator.java

[counters are dropping to 1|
https://github.com/apache/hive/commit/a37827ecd557c7f7d69f3b2ccdbf6535908b1461#diff-e70a9d33150346fe8b9b7d719d677b97L356]
item.summary: Runtime rowcount calculation is incorrect in vectorized executions

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
